publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4836 Mr Frank McAveety: Homeless World Cup Milano 2009â€”That the Parliament congratulates and supports the 48 nations and 500 players who are seeking "fast goals, true grit and and glory" at the Arena Civica Sempione Park in Milan for the 7th Homeless World Cup; recognises that "everyone needs to wake up in the morning with a goal" and that the Homeless World Cup provides the opportunity for homeless people and volunteers to get involved and help achieve their personal goals; further recognises the power of football to unite, and wishes every participant the best of luck during the event.
S3M-4836 Homeless World Cup Milano 2009 (lodged on 11 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4836 Homeless World Cup Milano 2009 (lodged on 11 September 2009) Johann Lamont*
S3M-4836 Homeless World Cup Milano 2009 (lodged on 11 September 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-4836 Homeless World Cup Milano 2009 (lodged on 11 September 2009) Rhoda Grant*, David Stewart*
S3M-4836 Homeless World Cup Milano 2009 (lodged on 11 September 2009) Jack McConnell*
